task.title: Pulling updates from the remote repository
task.shortdesc: The add-on supports pulling updates from remote branches using either the pull and merge or the pull and rebase strategy. The default setting is pull and merge.

prereq.p: Ensure that your current local branch is set up to track a remote branch and that you do not have any uncommitted changes.

step.cmd: Perform one of the following actions:

choices.choice: To pull from the upstream branch using the default strategy, click the Pull from remote/branch icon. Pull from remote/branch
To change the pull strategy, expand the Pull menu and select either Pull (merge) or Pull (rebase). Pull options

result.p: If no conflicts occur, your current local branch is now up-to-date with the upstream branch.
